summary: A rebellious teen butts heads with the teachers at an all-girl charm school in Mexico City.
cast: Martha Higareda|Blanca Guerra|Camila Sodi|Ximena Sariñana|María Aura|Alejandra Adame|Zaide Silvia Gutiérrez|Salvador Sánchez|Rafael Sánchez Navarro|Roberto D'Amico|Mario Corona|Humberto Busto|Daniel Berlanga|Víctor González|Diana Golden|Margarita Wynne|Verónica Langer|Juan Carrillo|Socorro Miranda|Carolina Rivera|Carmen Rodríguez|Cinthia Vazquez|Natalie Schumacher|Cecilia Ponce|Alan Alarcón|Jorge Luis Moreno|Leonardo Rey|Daniel Continente|Olga Millán|Diana Mathes|Fernando Sarfatti|Jessica Samperio Diaz|Paulina Marisol|Alejandro Sariñana|Alfredo Alonso|Tomihuatzi Xelhuantzin|Damayanti Quintanar|José Eleazar Márquez|Fernando Manzano|Armando Murillo
title: Niñas mal
